channel.description: Why using types? When are they useful? Why we should care about types? What are types? These are the questions this series of posts give some answers to. Letâ€™s start by realizing a fundamental fact: types are everywhere! Business models are all about types: users, shipments, orders, etc. Placing a user in the cart or shipping a client just makes no sense. Types are specification, discriminating what makes sense from what makes not.
